title.rendered: Creating Email Series Around the Lead Magnet with Rob Patterson from AWeber

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:51 — 23.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:51 — 23.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Rob Patterson is CMO  of AWeber. AWeber is a company focussed on making email marketing powerfully simple for small business owners so they can grow their business quickly.

Email Marketing is a flexible and cost-effective way of reaching customers and retaining existing customers. It also allows us to create targeted and personalized messages which help us to build relationships with our clients. It will also improve response rates to your direct marketing campaigns.

Rob Patterson will be talking about email strategies that convert readers to customers.

You’ll Learn About:

  • The 7 types of emails to send out
  • The 7 email strategy for converting readers into customers
  • The effectiveness of email marketing
  • What are the standard email metrics
  • What are AWeber updates this year
  • How does Dynamic Content become a game-changer
  • The importance of segmenting contacts and lists within the database
  • Why AWeber is recommended for email marketing

Next Step:

AWeber offers a 30-day trial, Including all features!

You can play with AWeber smart designer on the site

www.amazingfba.com/aweber

 

Related topics about Email Marketing:

  • Email marketing and Amazon DPS with Brad Moss of Product Labs
  • Following up on Amazon Reviews with Automated Email with Henson Wu
  • Amazon email followup for review with Henson Wu
  • Amazon TOS updates on emails with Henson Wu

 

Resources:

https://www.aweber.com/

 

Watch Creating Email Series Around the Lead Magnet with Rob Patterson
